message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. I understand you may not know the full potential yet, so I'm willing to offer it at a price that reflects its minimum value to me: $1250000. This is a significant discount from what I believe it's truly worth.  If you're interested, I'd be happy to provide you with more information and answer any questions you have.
